updater.concurrent
Class LockUtil

java.lang.Object
  updater.concurrent.LockUtil

public class LockUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities for acquiring file lock. This class contain function that can help to acquire suitable lock for launcher and downloader.

Author:
Chan Wai Shing

Constructor Detail

LockUtil

Method Detail

acquireLock

public static ConcurrentLock acquireLock(java.io.File fileToLock,
                                         int timeout,
                                         int retryDelay)
Acquire a exclusive lock on the file with retry.

Parameters:
fileToLock - the file to lock
timeout - the retry timeout (in milli seconds)
retryDelay - the time to sleep between retries, should >= 0 (in milli seconds)
Returns:
the lock if acquired successfully, null if failed
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - retryDelay < 0

acquireLock

public static ConcurrentLock acquireLock(LockType lockType,
                                         java.io.File lockFolder,
                                         int timeout,
                                         int retryDelay)
Acquire a lock according to the lockType.

Parameters:
lockType - the type of the lock to acquire
lockFolder - the folder to place the lock file
timeout - the retry timeout (in milli seconds)
retryDelay - the time to sleep between retries, should >= 0 (in milli seconds)
Returns:
the lock if acquired successfully, null if failed
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - lockFolder is not a valid directory; retryDelay < 0
